minion.name: Alleycat
minion.skill: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Cat.
minion.goldenSkill: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Golden Cat.

minion.name: Fiendish Servant
minion.skill: Deathrattle: Give this minion's Attack to a random friendly minion.
minion.goldenSkill: Deathrattle: Give this minion's Attack to two random friendly minions.

minion.name: Micro Mummy
minion.skill: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
minion.goldenSkill: At the end of your turn, give two another random friendly minions +1 Attack.

minion.name: Murloc Tidecaller
minion.skill: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
minion.goldenSkill: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +2 Attack.

minion.name: Murloc Tidehunter
minion.skill: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Murloc Scout.
minion.goldenSkill: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Golden Murloc Scout.

minion.name: Rockpool Hunter
minion.skill: Battlecry: Give random friendly Murloc +1/+1.
minion.goldenSkill: Battlecry: Give random friendly Murloc +2/+2.

minion.name: Scavenging Hyena
minion.skill: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.
minion.goldenSkill: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +4/+2.

minion.name: Wrath Weaver
minion.skill: After you play a Demon, deal 1 damage to your hero and gain +2/+2.
minion.goldenSkill: After you play a Demon, deal 1 damage to your hero and gain +4/+4.

minion.name: Vulgar Homunculus
minion.skill: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
minion.goldenSkill: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.

minion.name: Spawn of NZoth

minion.goldenSkill: Deathrattle: Give your minions +2/+2.

minion.goldenSkill: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Golden Imp.

minion.goldenSkill: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Golden Damaged Golem.

minion.name: Kindly Grandmother

minion.goldenSkill: Deathrattle: Summon a 6/4 Golden Big Bad Wolf.

minion.name: Metaltooth Leaper

minion.goldenSkill: Battlecry: Give your other minions +4 Attack.

minion.goldenSkill: Your other Murlocs have +4 Attack.

minion.goldenSkill: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion +4/+4.

minion.name: Old Murk-Eye

minion.goldenSkill: Has +2 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.

minion.name: Pack Leader

minion.goldenSkill: Whenever you summon a Beast, give it +4 Attack.

minion.name: Selfless Hero
minion.skill: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield.
minion.goldenSkill: Deathrattle: Give two random friendly minions Divine Shield.

minion.name: Rat Pack
minion.skill: Deathrattle: Summon a number of 1/1 Rats equal to this minion's attack.
minion.goldenSkill: Deathrattle: Summon a number of 2/2 Golden Rats equal to this minion's attack.
